entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 23. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow this evening. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 11 March 2023
